name: MASA Business Solutions
tag_list: ifrs, fixed-assets, pp-and-e, ppe, fixed-assets-management, c-gaap, us-gaap, local-gaap
overview:
At MASA we are dedicated to develop specialized solutions to help our clients in addressing challenges facing their businesses.

Our goal is to deliver quality results more efficiently through solutions that focus on simplicity, accuracy and timeliness.

Leveraging on a team of information systems specialists, accounting experts and business consultants we are able to deploy the right technology to serve specific business needs. Our solutions are built on our deep technical knowledge, functional expertise and practical thinking.
